message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit too high for me right now.  Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $85? That's a fair compromise, I think.

I'm glad we're close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to give away the value of the product.
Alice, I understand you value your product.  How about we split the difference and make it $88?  That's a pretty good deal for both of us, wouldn't you say?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
